column5: got a mini tourney happening on opener...was wondering how this heat wave is effecting the water temps on buckhorn pigeon and chemong.  Any of you bys been out there?  Jimmer? Im sure you were in the vessel this weekend?
73 mid afternoon but then 69-70 in morning.
73 mid afternoon but then 69-70 in morning. hoping it stays below 75 for this weekend!  is that mid lake or in a bay?
Spotty around lake. Warmer on windy shores.
